mapper.select: SELECT bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount FROM ( SELECT SEQ, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount FROM ( SELECT * FROM board where bname=#{vo.bname} ORDER BY bnum DESC ) ) WHERE SEQ >= (#{page}-1)*#{limit}+1 ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes FROM ( SELECT SEQ, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes FROM ( SELECT * FROM board where bname=#{vo.bname} and title like #{searchWord} ORDER BY bnum DESC ) ) WHERE SEQ >= (#{page}-1)*#{limit}+1 ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes FROM ( SELECT SEQ, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes FROM ( SELECT * FROM board where bname=#{vo.bname} and writer like #{searchWord} ORDER BY bnum DESC ) ) WHERE SEQ >= (#{page}-1)*#{limit}+1 ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
select count(*) from board where bname=#{bname}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bnum, bname, caname, writer, title, content) values(seq_board.nextval, #{bname}, #{caname}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set vcount=vcount+1 where bnum = #{bnum}
